overview: A fun, unique, sexy and informative video docudrama about Les Nichols, a trans man. It includes an intimate view of the night he and Annie Sprinkle tried out his new, surgically-constructed genitalia for the first time. His dual genitalia and all of their amazing functions are shown in detail. Revealing interviews, medical photographs, and Annie's heart-warming diary excerpts make this a chronicle of interest to film buffs, trans people, and those that love them. This seminal film from 1989 was the first of its kind.
title: Linda/Les and Annie
